remarks.para: EICAS and/or STANDBY indications for one engine may be inoperative provided:

numlitem.para: EPR (EICAS and STANDBY) indications for both engines are operative,
N2 and N3 EICAS indications for associated engine are operative, and
Fuel flow indications for associated engine are operative.

placard.para: Placard near upper EICAS "L (R) N1 TACH INOP" and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
